prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as a high-fashion sculptural beauty editorial. PRESERVE: Face 100% identical — one-to-one likeness. No changes to facial features, proportions, age, expression. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original — no modification whatsoever. Original camera angle, crop, framing preserved — no zoom, no perspective shift. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections. High-shine editorial glow, lacquered skin effect. No smoothing, no airbrushing. Remove only minor blemishes. HAIR: [HAIR_STYLE]. Enhance texture and shine through lighting only. Hair color must match original. ACCESSORIES: [ACCESSORIES]. SETUP: Hard high-contrast editorial studio lighting. Sculptural highlights on cheekbones, temples, shoulders. [BG_COLOR] studio background — solid, clean, no gradients. Luxury fashion editorial, Vogue-level finish. 4:5 format, original dimensions.
